类 Grid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Grid
  • 直接已知子类:
    Sudoku

    public class Grid
extends java.lang.Object
    Grid class for Sudoku Solver in Java.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      Grid()
      Constructor for the Grid class.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void checkInput(java.lang.String gridStr)
      Checks if the input string is valid.
      int[] getBox(int row, int col)
      Gets a specific box (3x3 sub-grid) from the grid.
      int[] getColumn(int col)
      Gets a specific column from the grid.
      int[][] getGrid()
      Gets a copy of the grid.
      int[][] getGridIterator()
      Gets an iterator to iterate over the grid.
      int[] getRow(int row)
      Gets a specific row from the grid.
      void init(java.lang.String gridStr)
      Initializes the grid from a string input.
      void parseInput(java.lang.String inputString)
      Parses the input string to a 2D grid.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • Grid

        public Grid()
        Constructor for the Grid class. Initializes the grid to null.

    • 方法详细资料

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String gridStr)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes the grid from a string input.
        参数:
        gridStr - the string representation of the grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input string is invalid

      • checkInput

        public void checkInput(java.lang.String gridStr)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Checks if the input string is valid.
        参数:
        gridStr - the string representation of the grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input string does not have the correct length, contains non-digit characters, or contains out-of-range digits

      • parseInput

        public void parseInput(java.lang.String inputString)
                throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Parses the input string to a 2D grid.
        参数:
        inputString - the string representation of the grid
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the input string is invalid

      • getRow

        public int[] getRow(int row)
        Gets a specific row from the grid.
        参数:
        row - the index of the row to retrieve
        返回:
        an array representing the row

      • getColumn

        public int[] getColumn(int col)
        Gets a specific column from the grid.
        参数:
        col - the index of the column to retrieve
        返回:
        an array representing the column

      • getBox

        public int[] getBox(int row,
                    int col)
        Gets a specific box (3x3 sub-grid) from the grid.
        参数:
        row - the row index of the top-left cell of the box
        col - the column index of the top-left cell of the box
        返回:
        an array representing the box

      • getGrid

        public int[][] getGrid()
        Gets a copy of the grid.
        返回:
        a 2D array representing the grid

      • getGridIterator

        public int[][] getGridIterator()
        Gets an iterator to iterate over the grid.
        返回:
        a 2D array representing the grid
